summary: This endpoint only for PH and BR local sellers only
description: This endpoint only for PH and BR local sellers only. This API is used for seller to retrieve a list of order IDs that are pending invoice upload.

query.name: order_sn
query.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

request_examples.code:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.uat.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/order/get_buyer_invoice_info?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'POST',
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => '{
    "queries": [
        {
            "order_sn": "220314U0G6UNMN"
        }
    ]
}',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

schema.name: order_sn
schema.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

schema.name: invoice_type
schema.description: Type of invoice requested: {1: personal, 2: company}.

schema.name: invoice_detail
schema.description: Invoice info submitted by buyer. Might be masked, e.g. A****b, depending on order status.

schema.name: name
schema.description: Buyer name (only has value when invoice_type is personal) - VN, TH, PH only

schema.name: email
schema.description: Buyer email address (only has value when invoice_type is personal) - VN, TH, PH only

schema.name: phone_number
schema.description: Buyer phone number - TH only

schema.name: tax_id
schema.description: only has value when invoice_type is personal. - VN, TH, PH only

schema.name: address
schema.description: Buyer address in format "Street & number, city, zipcode, any additional info provided by buyer" (only has value when invoice_type is personal) - PH, VN only

schema.name: id_card_address
schema.description: Same function as the address, only having a different field name for TH.Buyer address in format "Street & number, city, zipcode, any additional info provided by buyer" (only has value when invoice_type is personal).

schema.name: address_breakdown
schema.description: Buyer address breakdown. - TH, PH only

schema.name: region
schema.description: Return region value - PH, TH only

schema.name: state
schema.description: Return value - TH: Province

schema.name: city
schema.description: Return value - TH: District

schema.name: town
schema.description: Return value - TH: Sub district

schema.name: postcode
schema.description: Return value - TH: Postal code - PH: Postal code

schema.name: detailed_address
schema.description: Return value - PH: Additional details, i.e. street name, building - TH: Additional details, i.e. house number

schema.name: additional_info
schema.description: Return value: - Empty for PH, TH

schema.name: full_address
schema.description: - only has value when invoice_type is personal - Buyer address in format "detailed_address, town, district, state, postcode, additional_info" for all regions --- for TH: leave the 'additional_info' as empty

schema.name: company_head_office
schema.description: - return value for TH only (only has value when invoice_type is company)

schema.name: company_name
schema.description: - Only return value when invoice type is company - VN, TH, PH only

schema.name: company_branch_name
schema.description: - Only return value when invoice type is company - TH only

schema.name: company_branch_id
schema.description: - Only return value when invoice type is company - TH only

schema.name: company_type
schema.description: - Only return value when invoice type is company - TH only

schema.name: company_email
schema.description: - Only return value when invoice type is company - VN, TH, PH only

schema.name: company_tax_id
schema.description: - Only return value when invoice type is company - VN, TH, PH only

schema.name: company_address
schema.description: Buyer address in format "Street & number,city, zipcode, any additional info provided by buyer" (only has value when invoice_type is company) - VN, TH only

schema.name: company_address_breakdown
schema.description: Company address breakdown - PH, TH only

schema.name: company_region
schema.description: Return region value - PH, TH only

schema.name: company_state
schema.description: Return value - PH: Province - TH: Province

schema.name: company_city
schema.description: Return value - PH: City

schema.name: company_district
schema.description: Return value - PH: Barangay - TH: District

schema.name: company_town
schema.description: Return value - TH: Sub district

schema.name: company_postcode
schema.description: Return postal code - TH, PH only

schema.name: company_detailed_address
schema.description: Return value - PH: Detailed address - TH: Detailed address

schema.name: company_additional_info
schema.description: Return value: - Empty for PH, TH

schema.name: company_full_address
schema.description: Concatenation of company address breakdown - only has value when invoice_type is company

schema.name: error
schema.description: Error in retrieving the receipt setting of a particular order.

schema.name: is_requested
schema.description: To identify order with and without buyer request, applicable to PL.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: Request id for debugging purposes

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

examples.code:
{
    "request_id": "a2c45ca2683caf1651ecab5a4d5942ce",
    "error": "",
    "message": "",
    "invoice_info_list": [
        {
            "order_sn": "2209160VNPKXF7",
            "invoice_type": "personal",
            "invoice_detail": {
                "name": "Kevin Yap",
                "email": "testing.just@op.pl",
                "address": "Ordona 7B Warszawa, Warszawa, 01237",
                "phone_number": "",
                "tax_id": "",
                "address_breakdown": {
                    "region": "Poland",
                    "state": "",
                    "city": "Warszawa",
                    "district": "",
                    "town": "Warszawa",
                    "postcode": "01237",
                    "detailed_address": "Ordona 7B Warszawa",
                    "additional_info": "",
                    "full_address": "Ordona 7B Warszawa, Warszawa, 01237"
                }
            },
            "is_requested": false,
            "error": ""
        }
    ]
}

error_codes.message: There is no access_token in query.
There is no partner_id in query.
There is no sign in query.
